name: Telekom Austria AG
bossPosition: Director M&A, International Affairs and Regulation
membership: Telekom Austria AG and its operating companies are inter alia members of ETNO and GSMA.
goal: Telekom Austria AG, which is listed on the Vienna Stock Exchange, is a leading communication provider serving approximately 23 million customers in eight countries in Central and Eastern Europe. The broad portfolio of fixed line and mobile communication products and services includes voice telephony, broadband Internet, multimedia services, IPTV, data and IT services, wholesale and payment services.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: European Electronic Communication Code, e-Privacy Regulation, Copyright, Roaming, Net Neutrality, ...
